feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 10:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
